uniol.apt.analysis.synthesize.separation

Class SeparationSynthesizer

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Synthesizer

    public class SeparationSynthesizer
extends java.lang.Object

    Interface for something that synthesizes a Petri net.
    Author:
    Uli Schlachter

    • Constructor Detail

      • SeparationSynthesizer

        public SeparationSynthesizer(TransitionSystem ts,
                             Separation separation,
                             boolean onlyEventSeparation,
                             boolean quickFail)
        Synthesize the given transition system via the given separation implementation.
        Parameters:
        ts - The transition system to synthesize.
        separation - A separation implementation that solves separation problems on the given transition system.
        onlyEventSeparation - A flag indicating that state separation should be ignored.
        quickFail - If true, stop the calculation as soon as it is known that it won't be successful. If false, try to solve all separation problems. Only if true will the list of failed problems be fully filled.

    • Method Detail

      • getSeparatingRegions

        public java.util.Collection<Region> getSeparatingRegions()
        Description copied from interface: Synthesizer
        Get separating regions. A collection of regions is separating if each solvable separation problem is also solved by a region from this collection.
        Specified by:
        getSeparatingRegions in interface Synthesizer
        Returns:
        A separating collection of regions.

      • getUnsolvableEventStateSeparationProblems

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<State>> getUnsolvableEventStateSeparationProblems()
        Description copied from interface: Synthesizer
        Get all unsolvable event/state separation problems. Such an unsolvable problem consists of an event, which is the key of a map, and a state, which is an entry in the value of the map.
        Specified by:
        getUnsolvableEventStateSeparationProblems in interface Synthesizer
        Returns:
        All unsolvable event/state separation problems.

      • getUnsolvableStateSeparationProblems

        public java.util.Collection<java.util.Set<State>> getUnsolvableStateSeparationProblems()
        Description copied from interface: Synthesizer
        Get all unsolvable sate separation problems. This should return the equivalence class of unsolvable states, i.e.e each state should be contained in at most one set of the returned collection.
        Specified by:
        getUnsolvableStateSeparationProblems in interface Synthesizer
        Returns:
        All unsolvable state separation problems.
